notification.title: Notifications
notification.reactedToYourPost_one: {{actor}} and 1 other reacted to your post with {{emoji}}
notification.reactedToYourPost_other: {{actor}} and {{count}} others reacted to your post with {{emoji}}

intro.title: What is Hackers' Pub?
intro.content: Hackers' Pub is a place for software engineers to share their knowledge and experience with each other. It's also an ActivityPub-enabled social network, so you can follow your favorite hackers in the fediverse and get their latest posts in your feed.

nav.openSource: The source code of this website is available on {{repository}} under the {{license}} license.

signInUp.title: Sign in
signInUp.description: If you have an account, we'll send you a sign-in link and code. If you have a passkey registered, you can use it to sign in instead. If you don't have an account, you need to be invited by an existing Hackers' Pub member.
signInUp.invalidEmailOrUsername: Invalid email address or username. Please check your input.
signInUp.noSuchEmailOrUsername: This email address or username is not registered with Hackers' Pub.
signInUp.emailSentCommonDescription: You can complete sign-in with opening received url or submitting received code through below form.
signInUp.emailSentDescription: An email has been sent to {{email}} with a sign-in link and sign-in code. $t(signInUp.emailSentCommonDescription)
signInUp.emailSentToUsernameDescription: An email has been sent to {{username}}'s email address with a sign-in link and sign-in code. $t(signInUp.emailSentCommonDescription)
signInUp.emailSentExpires: Note that the link and code will expire in {{expiration}}.
signInUp.emailSentResend: You can always request a new link and code by signing in again.
signInUp.passkeyCanceled: Authenticating with passkey was canceled or failed. Please try again.
signInUp.passkeyFailed: Failed to authenticate with passkey. Refresh the page and try again.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.invalidCode: The sign-up link is invalid. Please make sure you're using the correct link from the email you received.
signUp.welcome: Welcome to Hackers' Pub! Please fill out the form below to complete your sign-up.
signUp.emailDescription: Your email address will be used to sign in to your account.
signUp.name: $t(settings.profile.name)
signUp.cocDescription: I have read and agree to the $t(signUp.coc).

profile.title: Profile settings
profile.avatarDescription: Your avatar will be displayed on your profile and in your posts. You can upload a PNG, JPEG, GIF, or WebP image up to 5 MiB in size.
profile.avatarInvalid: Invalid image format. Please upload a PNG, JPEG, GIF, or WebP image.
profile.avatarTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size is 5 MiB.
profile.usernameDescription: Your username will be used to create your profile URL and your fediverse handle.
profile.usernameCaution: You can change it only once, and the old username will become available to others.
profile.usernameChanged: As you have already changed it {{changed}}, you can't change it again.
profile.usernameTooLong: Username is too long. Maximum length is 50 characters.
profile.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.
profile.name: Name
profile.nameDescription: Your name will be displayed on your profile and in your posts.
profile.nameTooLong: Name is too long. Maximum length is 50 characters.
profile.bioDescription: Your bio will be displayed on your profile. You can use Markdown to format it.
profile.bioTooLong: Bio is too long. Maximum length is 512 characters.
profile.linkNameDescription: A name for the link that will be displayed on your profile, e.g., GitHub.
profile.urlDescription: The URL of the link, e.g., https://github.com/yourhandle.
profile.howToVerifyLinks: Note that you can verify your links belong to you by making the linked pages also link to your Hackers' Pub profile with {{relMe}} attribute.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.preferAiSummaryDescription: If enabled, the AI will generate a summary of the article for you. Otherwise, the first few lines of the article will be used as the summary.

language.title: Language settings
language.hideForeignLanguages: Hide posts in languages you don't know from your timeline

invite.title: Invite
invite.description_zero: Invite your friends to Hackers' Pub. Currently, you have no invitations left—please check back later.
invite.description_one: Invite your friends to Hackers' Pub. You can invite up to 1 person.
invite.description_other: Invite your friends to Hackers' Pub. You can invite up to {{count}} people.
invite.emailDescription: The email address is not only used for receiving the invitation, but also for signing in to the account.
invite.languageDescription: Choose the language your friend prefers. This language will only be used for the invitation.
invite.extraMessageDescription: Your friend will see this message in the invitation email.
invite.noLeftInvitations: You have no invitations left. Please try again later.
invite.alreadyExists: {{account}} is already a member of Hackers' Pub.
invite.success_zero: The invitation has been sent to {{email}}. You have no invitations left.
invite.success_one: The invitation has been sent to {{email}}. You have 1 invitation left.
invite.success_other: The invitation has been sent to {{email}}. You have {{count}} invitations left.
invite.invitationEmailText:
{{inviter}} invites you to Hackers' Pub!

$t(home.intro.content)

To accept the invitation, click the following link:

{{verifyUrl}}

This link will expire in {{expiration}}.
invite.invitationLinksDescription: You can use invitation links to join Hackers' Pub. Invitation links can be shared with others.

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.registerDescription: Register a passkey to sign in to your account. You can use a passkey instead of receiving a sign-in link by email.
passkeys.registerFailed: Failed to register a passkey. Please try again later.
passkeys.name: Passkey name
passkeys.nameDescription: A name for the passkey. This will be displayed on the below list.
passkeys.listDescription: The following passkeys are registered to your account. You can use them to sign in to your account.
passkeys.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this passkey? You won't be able to use it to sign in to your account anymore.

followerList.title: {{name}}'s followers
followerList.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} ({{handle}}) from your followers?

profile.verifiedDescription: This link is verified that it belongs to this user.
profile.blockConfirm: Are you sure you want to block {{name}} ({{handle}})? They won't be able to follow you or see your posts.
profile.unblockConfirm: Are you sure you want to unblock {{name}} ({{handle}})? They will be able to follow you and see your posts.
profile.blockedDescription: You are blocked by this user. You can't follow them or see their posts.
profile.blockingDescription: You are blocking this user. They can't follow you or see your posts.
profile.successorDescription: This account has moved to {{successor}}. This account is no longer in use.

articleDrafts.title: Article drafts
articleDrafts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this draft?

article.remoteCommentDescription: If you have a fediverse account, you can comment on this article from your own instance. Search {{permalink}} on your instance and reply to it.
article.remoteQuoteDescription: If you have a fediverse account, you can quote this article from your own instance. Search {{permalink}} on your instance and quote it. (Note that quoting is not supported in Mastodon.)
article.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this article?
article.beingTranslatedDescription: This article is being translated from {{sourceLanguage}} to {{targetLanguage}}. Please wait until the translation is complete.
article.translated: This article has been translated from {{sourceLanguage}} to {{targetLanguage}}.

note.title: {{name}}: {{content}}
note.remoteReplyDescription: If you have a fediverse account, you can reply to this note from your own instance. Search {{permalink}} on your instance and reply to it.
note.remoteQuoteDescription: If you have a fediverse account, you can quote this note from your own instance. Search {{permalink}} on your instance and quote it. (Note that quoting is not supported in Mastodon.)

post.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

editor.titleRequired: Please enter a title for your article.
editor.contentPlaceholder: Write your article here. You can use Markdown. Your article will be automatically saved as a draft while you're writing.
editor.contentRequired: Please enter some content for your article.
editor.tagsRequired: Please enter at least one tag for your article.

publishMode.title: $t(editor.publish)
publishMode.description: You're about to publish your article. Please review it before publishing.
publishMode.slugDescription: This will be a part of the permalink of your article:
publishMode.slugAlreadyTaken: An article with the same slug already exists. Please choose a different slug.
publishMode.failed: Failed to publish the article. Please try again later.

composer.threadPlaceholder: Write a continuation note to thread it.
composer.quotePlaceholder: Enter text to quote the above content.
composer.mediumAltPlaceholder: Alt text for visually impaired people
composer.quoteArticleConfirm: Do you want to quote this article?
composer.quoteNoteConfirm: Do you want to quote this note?
composer.postFailed: Failed to submit your note. Please try again later.

recommendedActors.title: Who to follow
recommendedActors.description: Here are some hackers you might be interested in.

localePriorityList.languagesToSelectDescription: Languages supported by Hackers' Pub UI are shown in {{boldText}}.
localePriorityList.selectedLanguagesDescription: Please arrange them in order of your familiar languages.

invitationTree.title: Invitation tree
invitationTree.hideMe: Hide me from the invitation tree
invitationTree.showMe: Show me in the invitation tree
invitationTree.hiddenAccountDescription: This account is hidden because they want to keep their identity private.

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.description: The page you were looking for could not be found.

invitationLink.description: {{inviter}} invites you to Hackers' Pub! Enter your email address below to join Hackers' Pub.
invitationLink.invitationsLeft_one: 1 person can join Hackers' Pub using this invitation link.
invitationLink.invitationsLeft_other: {{count}} people can join Hackers' Pub using this invitation link.
invitationLink.expired: This invitation link has expired. You need to use another invitation link to join Hackers' Pub.
invitationLink.exhausted: This invitation link has been exhausted. You need to use another invitation link to join Hackers' Pub.
invitationLink.duplicateEmail: This email address is already registered with Hackers' Pub. Please use a different email address.
invitationLink.sent: An email to join Hackers' Pub has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (it might be in your spam folder).

remoteFollow.title: Remote Follow
remoteFollow.description: To follow {{actorName}}, enter your fediverse handle.
remoteFollow.fediverseIdInvalid: Invalid fediverse handle format. Please enter in @username@domain.com format.
remoteFollow.userLookupGenericError: An error occurred while looking up user information.
remoteFollow.followServiceNotFound: Could not find the follow page for this service.

api.webfingerLookupError: An error occurred during WebFinger lookup.
api.objectNotActor: The retrieved object is not an actor.
